trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The worried waif looks around in desperation.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the puissant potion-maker.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_TODO_01<tab>Use the copper knife on the trees northwest of Gatetown to gather strips of dried bark.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the strips of dried bark to the puissant potion-maker.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the pouch of herbal pellets to the worried waif.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_000<tab>Please, won't anybody help us...?
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_001<tab>It's my brother─his belly hurts so much, he can't even move. I don't think the “fresh water” we bought was fresh at all...

TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_002<tab>Could you talk to the potion-maker for us, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>? I already tried, but when he started explaining the things he wanted for the medicine, I... I got scared and ran away.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_003<tab>The potion-maker needed something to make the medicine, but I've already forgotten what he said...
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_010<tab>Welcome, welcome! What concoctions are you after today, then?
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_011<tab>...Ah, yes, I remember─the young girl and her ailing brother.

TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_012<tab>I'd used the last of my bark, you see, and all I wanted was for her to gather some from the trees on the cape. The way she ran off, you'd think I'd asked for a bowl of her blood or something...
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_013<tab>You're welcome to collect a few strips in her stead if you like... Although I don't expect you'd want the bother.

TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_014<tab>...Still here? Very well, then. Find some trees, and use this knife to very carefully peel away three pieces of nice, dry bark. I won't hold my breath.

TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_015<tab>All I need is three or so nicely dried strips of bark. Make sure you use that copper knife. Very important. Oh, and do bring the knife back, if you please?
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_020<tab>Ah, I see you finally came to your senses. Let's have that knife back, then...
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_021<tab>...What's this?
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_022<tab>You actually went to harvest the bark!? But...what could you possibly hope to gain? Kindness will get you nowhere in this rotten town!
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_023<tab><sigh> What a rare soul you must be... I suppose I have no choice now but to mix up the cure I promised.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_024<tab>I've mixed some herbs and powders together with the bark you brought─a few pellets a day should soon settle the aches in the lad's stomach.
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_025<tab>Never mind the payment. After all, it's you who's done most of the legwork.

TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_PHARMACIST03354_000_026<tab>You know, I'd hoped to trade my healing skills for a life in Eulmore, but...maybe my place is here, amongst the poor and the desperate. To help for the sake of helping, to be needed. Aye, it's not a bad feeling...
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_030<tab>Did you go and see the potion-maker...?
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_031<tab>...For my brother!? Oh, thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! You've saved his life!
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_032<tab>You'll be wanting coin, right? Uh, I'm not sure we─
TEXT_LUCKZA012_03354_POORGIRKL03354_000_033<tab>...What do you mean, “nothing”? Here, you must take these at least─I collected them myself! Thank you again!
